mapper.select: select category.name as categoryName, trend.name as trendName, trend.id as trendId from category, trend where category.id = trend.category_id and self_made=0

select.if: select trend.id, name, category_id as categoryId, description, thumbnail, keywords, year, month, week from trend, trend_predict where trend.id = trend_predict.trend_id and id=#{trendId}

mapper.select: select * from news where trend_id=#{trendId} order by pub_date desc
select * from twitter where trend_id=#{trendId} order by date desc
